lead_paragraph: COACH In Ghana, the coach of Senegal’s national team, Henryk Kasperczak, 61, of Poland, announced his resignation Monday, a day after his team was upset, 3-1, by Angola in the African Cup of Nations. Senegal must win its final first-round game, Thursday against South Africa, by a wide margin to have a chance to advance.
